markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Equendia](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2511)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 38

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Equendia](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2511)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Mummy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=228" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 52

**Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Skald](/Languages.aspx?ID=42)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +20, [Astronomy Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +20, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +22, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +22, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +4

**Con** +5

**Int** +5

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +7
</row>

**Items**
[_cloak of the bat_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=425), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +21 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 175
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

</row>

**Immunities**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 10

**Great Despair** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) 30 feet. Living creatures are [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) while in Equendia's great despair aura. They can't naturally recover from this fear while in the area but recover instantly once they leave it. When a creature first enters the area, it must succeed at a DC 27 Will save (after taking the penalty from being frightened) or be [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) for 1d4 rounds. The creature is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+13 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold and blackfrost rot

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite longbow_ +22 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 2d6+13 piercing

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 30
- **3rd**
[Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=104) (at will)
- **4th**
[Glibness](/Spells.aspx?ID=135), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)
- **5th**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Subconscious Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=314), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)
- **6th**
[Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87)

**Blackfrost Rot**  ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) As [blackfrost](/Curses.aspx?ID=51), but DC 30.

**Frozen Breath** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) Equendia exhales a 60-foot cone of icy shards that deal 6d6 cold and 6d6 slashing damage (DC 30 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). She can't use Frozen Breath again for 1d4 rounds.

**Hissing Command** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16)) Equendia utters a swift command in [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) to strike at adjacent enemies. Any blackfrost zombies within 30 feet can use a reaction to attempt a melee Strike.

**Invasive Blackfrost**   If a PC is critically hit by any of Equendia's Strikes, the wound takes on an unnerving blackened appearance, as if from advanced frostbite or charring. For the next 24 hours, the PC is no longer immune to [blackfrost](/Curses.aspx?ID=51).

</column>
name: Equendia
primary_source: Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires pg. 52

Living creatures are frightened 1 while in Equendia's great despair aura. They can't naturally recover from this fear while in the area but recover instantly once they leave it. When a creature first enters the area, it must succeed at a DC 27 Will save (after taking the penalty from being frightened) or be paralyzed for 1d4 rounds. The creature is then temporarily immune for 24 hours. --- Speed 20 feet Melee Single Action fist +24 (Agile, Magical), Damage 2d8+13 bludgeoning plus 1d6 cold and blackfrost rot Ranged Single Action composite longbow +22 (deadly d10, Propulsive, range 100 feet, volley 30 feet), Damage 2d6+13 piercing Occult Innate Spells DC 30 - 3rd Enthrall (at will) - 4th Glibness, Suggestion - 5th Command, Subconscious Suggestion, Tongues - 6th Dominate Blackfrost Rot (Cold, Curse, Disease, Divine, Necromancy) As blackfrost, but DC 30. Frozen Breath Two Actions (Cold, Concentrate, Divine, Evocation) Equendia exhales a 60-foot cone of icy shards that deal 6d6 cold and 6d6 slashing damage (DC 30 basic Reflex save). She can't use Frozen Breath again for 1d4 rounds. Hissing Command Single Action (Auditory) Equendia utters a swift command in Necril to strike at adjacent enemies. Any blackfrost zombies within 30 feet can use a reaction to attempt a melee Strike. Invasive Blackfrost If a PC is critically hit by any of Equendia's Strikes, the wound takes on an unnerving blackened appearance, as if from advanced frostbite or charring. For the next 24 hours, the PC is no longer immune to blackfrost.
